claim: Darth Vader says to Luke in The Empire Strikes Back, Obi-Wan never told you what happened to your father.

supporting.text: The statement is factually accurate as Obi-Wan Kenobi did not reveal the full truth about Anakin Skywalker's fate to Luke Skywalker in the original Star Wars film.

While Obi-Wan's statement was misleading, it wasn't entirely false since Anakin did 'die' when he became Darth Vader from a certain point of view.
The claim is about full truth, and Obi-Wan actively concealed the fact that Vader was Luke's father, making Darth Vader's statement accurate.
